system.description:
Time: Variable+Ritual: Prayer/Chant
Range: Touch+Duration: The Ceremony

A marriage ceremony which typically lasts 10-60 minutes. Both the groom and bride must be of the same religion, or one spouse must be baptized in the otherâ€™s faith before marriage. The ceremony blesses and awards 3d6 piety to each spouse, from the deity with success, or from the cleric with failure.
